Containers.Name: malfurious-postfixadmin
Containers.Description: This docker is designed to be used with malfurious-mailserver, malfurious-redis, and malfurious-roundcube. This docker requires a mysql database to connect to, preferably MariaDB. Create a database named "postfix" with a user named "postfix". Set your own password for the user. Enter your MariaDB/MySQL IP address or hostname for DBHOST. For DBPASS fill in the password you used when you setup your mysql database for user postfix. Also under Extra Parameters, replace "mail.domain.td" in "-h mail.domain.td" with the hostname for your mailserver. Port 8888 is for the postfix webgui. Finally, all credit for this docker goes to Hardware, I am merely formatting it for use in UnRaid as a template. Any other configuration settings you may be interested will be listed at: https://github.com/hardware/postfixadmin
Containers.Overview: Postfixadmin is an administrative interface for malfurious-mailserver.
